body_html:
hi @bignamehyp ,

Thanks for your tips. When I changed the "nvidia-smi -l 1 " to the "nvidia-smi -lms 1".
I saw the shorter interval timer had recorded the rumetime temperature which are out of slow down temperature.

When I changed the fans speed, can solve this problem.

hi @bignamehyp ,

body:
hi @bignamehyp ,

Thanks for your tips. When I changed  the "nvidia-smi -l 1 " to the "nvidia-smi -lms 1".
 I saw the shorter interval timer had recorded the rumetime temperature which are out of slow down temperature. 

When I changed the fans speed, can solve this problem.
